category: Obstructing or impeding the flow of an inland water
description: At all times during the life of the impounding works, <<a minimum/maximum>> flow of <<instantaneous rate or percentage>> / the total flow of the <<water body name>> immediately upstream of the <<lake/pond/reservoir>> created by the works, shall bypass the <<lake/pond/reservoir>>.
